title: Getting Started with Next.js
excerpt: Learn the basics of Next.js and how to build your first application.
content: Next.js is a React framework for building full-stack web applications. In this post, we'll cover the fundamentals of Next.js including routing, data fetching, and deployment.
author: John Doe

title: Understanding React Components
excerpt: Deep dive into React components and how they work in Next.js applications.
content: React components are the building blocks of modern web applications. In this post, we'll explore functional components, hooks, and how they integrate with Next.js.
author: Jane Smith

title: Styling in Next.js
excerpt: Explore different styling approaches in Next.js including CSS Modules, Tailwind CSS, and more.
content: Styling is an important part of any web application. Next.js provides multiple ways to style your components, from traditional CSS to modern utility-first frameworks.
author: Mike Johnson

title: Optimizing Performance in Next.js
excerpt: Learn techniques to optimize your Next.js application for better performance.
content: Performance is crucial for user experience. In this post, we'll cover code splitting, image optimization, and other performance optimization techniques in Next.js.
author: Sarah Williams
